member.name: IMFMediaSourceExtension.AddSourceBuffer
member.summary: Adds a to the collection of buffers associated with the .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaSourceExtension.GetActiveSourceBuffers
member.summary: Gets the source buffers that are actively supplying media data to the media source.
member.returns: The list of active source buffers.

member.name: IMFMediaSourceExtension.GetDuration
member.summary: Gets the duration of the media source in 100-nanosecond units.
member.returns: The duration of the media source in 100-nanosecond units.

member.name: IMFMediaSourceExtension.GetReadyState
member.summary: Gets the ready state of the media source.
member.returns: The ready state of the media source.

member.name: IMFMediaSourceExtension.GetSourceBuffer
member.summary: Gets the at the specified index in the collection of buffers.
member.param: The location of the buffer in the collection.

member.name: IMFMediaSourceExtension.GetSourceBuffers
member.summary: Gets the collection of source buffers associated with this media source.

member.name: IMFMediaSourceExtension.IsTypeSupported
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates if the specified MIME type is supported by the media source.
member.param: The media type to check support for.
member.returns: true if the media type is supported; otherwise, false.

member.name: IMFMediaSourceExtension.RemoveSourceBuffer
member.summary: Removes the specified source buffer from the collection of source buffers managed by the object.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaSourceExtension.SetDuration
member.summary: Sets the duration of the media source in 100-nanosecond units.
member.param: The duration of the media source in 100-nanosecond units.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaSourceExtension.SetEndOfStream
member.summary: Indicate that the end of the media stream has been reached.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaSourceExtension
member.summary: Provides functionality for the Media Source Extension (MSE).
